activities: Software Secure collect information from users of its websites and certain products and services. The data collected varies according to the product or service involved but often include individual user contact and identifying information. The data is provided to Software Secure and collected by Software Secure for purposes of authenticating the identity of an end-user in order to protect the integrity of an academic or certification examination.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) or Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
